title: Akali change !
body: Am i the one only one who thinks they have dropped to much the damage of her ult ? i mean what they did with the w. wow but the ult ???

replies.body: There are some good buffs for her on the pbe right now, not for her ult though. But dont be hyped yet, pbe patches dont always go live
i hope they will have some good buffs for her cause right now with the modifications to her ult, i dont even want to play her anymore, i think the only viable built might be the tankali one
